item.description:
TRAINING for TRANSITION
April 18-19, Portland ME



IMPORTANT:
For full details and to register for the course, visit
the Transition Training Website


In order to provide an in-depth experiential introduction to Transition for those considering bringing Transition to their community, and to meet the training requirement for local initiating groups, the Transition Center, Portland ME is now offering the two-day Training for Transition course as developed by Naresh Giangrande and Sophy Banks of the Transition Network, in England. It meets the training requirement for local initiating groups to become an internationally recognized Transition Town.

At the Training for Transition course, you will:
• Experience a deep understanding of the Transition ethos
• Experience an intimate encounter with the emerging future
• Develop skills to deal with difficult questions
• Have clear talking points around Climate Change and Peak Oil
• Receive an inspirational/energetic boost that will empower
and propel you as a powerful Transition catalyst in your community
• Connect with others who are responding to the call for Transition
• Connect with the heart of what may be the most important,
most inspirational movement in the world!
